entries.name: Barbarian
entries.description: An unarmoured warrior of great strength fueled, either by rage or their bond with nature.

entries.name: Bard
entries.description: A story teller or performer that weaves the threads of magic into their songs and dance.

entries.name: Cleric
entries.description: A chosen champion blessed with strength and magic by their deity, capable of inflicting and curing injuries.

entries.name: Druid
entries.description: A magician who wields powers born of nature and the elements, often taking the form of the animals they seek to protect.

entries.name: Fighter
entries.description: Trained in a variety of marital combat, capable of dealing devastating blows and weathering the same.

entries.name: Monk
entries.description: Warrior trained in the use of their body as a weapon, capable of harnessing the ki to devastating effect.

entries.name: Paladin
entries.description: A warrior sworn to duty by the oath they swore either to themselves or the god they serve.

entries.name: Ranger
entries.description: A combatant trained in the use of martial weapons and magic, relying on their knowledge of their surroundings they fight in remote areas.

entries.name: Rogue
entries.description: Trained in shadowy skills such as assassination and infiltration, capable of delivering killing blows from the shadows.

entries.name: Sorcerer
entries.description: A magic wielder who drawers their power either from their ancestry or the wild magic around them.

entries.name: Warlock
entries.description: Once a mortal, they are now capable of wielding great power gifted to them by a greater power in exchange for their service.

entries.name: Wizard
entries.description: A magic wielder who drawers their power from study and understanding of the arcane, capable of creation and destruction in equal measure.
